title: Have you ever felt relaxed after meeting a person recently? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. I had my in-laws staying over for few weeks, and with a one-year-old baby, it was quite hectic for me to keep up with daily chores, especially to look after my baby, who is now at the stage of discovering any and everything he sees in the house. His inquisitiveness is growing every day. I use to be tired to my bones. So, one day we planned for family dinner, my inlaws, and my parents. I usually dread going out anywhere with my kiddo, let along be going out for dinner. To my surprise, I had a wonderful evening cos, my mom, who was so elated after meeting her grandson after so long, ended up taking care of my baby so well, that I had my full course dinner, without even worrying about my baby’s whereabouts. I was so relaxed and thankful I get to meet my mom and have such a wonderful time after a very long time.

Yes, but for a short time. I met a girl, she isn’t that interesting but she was beautiful and friendly to me. Really enjoyed talking to her. Being an introvert talking to someone who is very friendly to you, you will really feel relaxed for a short time. You will be having your own personal work right!, you can’t stay with her/him for a long time. Enjoy every moment and work hard for future.
